remarks: Simple polynomial evaluation maps variables to projections. (Contributed by AV, 12-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evlvar.q $e |- Q = ( I eval S ) $.
evlvar.v $e |- V = ( I mVar S ) $.
evlvar.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evlvar.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
evlvar.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evlvar.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
evlvar $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( V ` X ) ) = ( g e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( g ` X ) ) ) $.
$d B g $.
$d I g $.
$d S g $.
$d X g $.
